sentences.en: Bubbles form afresh at each level.
sentences.cn: 气泡在每一层上重新形成.

sentences.en: Food had to be won afresh day by day.
sentences.cn: 天天都要重新获得食物.

sentences.en: He moved to America to start afresh .
sentences.cn: 他移居美国，重新开始生活。

sentences.en: Heathcliff's face brightened a moment; then it was overcast afresh, and sighed.
sentences.cn: 希刺克厉夫的脸色开朗了一下, 随后又阴沉下来并叹了口气.

sentences.en: His complex anger flamed afresh , and Ruth was in terror of him.
sentences.cn: 他的无名火又冒上来了, 罗丝见他真害怕.

sentences.en: I gave up my small apartment, sold my few belongings, and resolved to start afresh.
sentences.cn: 我退掉了我的小住房, 卖掉为数不多的的几件家俱, 决定开始另外一种生活.

sentences.en: I want to make a clean sweep of everything I've learnt and start afresh.
sentences.cn: 我要和以前学的那些玩艺儿一刀两断,一切从头开始.

sentences.en: If she wants to start afresh. I have only too obvious reasons for not hindering her.
sentences.cn: 她要是想重新安家立业, 那我毫无理由去妨碍她.

sentences.en: Isabel noted afresh that life was certainly hard for some people.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔重又看到,生命在某些人无疑是艰难的.

sentences.en: It was a chance to start afresh .
sentences.cn: 这是个重新开始的机会。

sentences.en: My wounds broke out afresh at this intelligence.
sentences.cn: 我一听到这消息,又悲从中来.

sentences.en: Only one expert source seemed prepared to analyse the problem afresh, from first principles.
sentences.cn: 只有一位专家似乎已准备要从根本原理着手重新研究这个问题。

sentences.en: The book had been lovingly stitched afresh with white cotton thread , which looked clean yet.
sentences.cn: 书背却是刚用白棉线整齐地装订过的, 那线看上去还很干净.

sentences.en: The weather grew drier and the grass became scanty and the nomads stirred afresh.
sentences.cn: 气候干燥,水草稀少,游牧民重新动荡起来.

sentences.en: Then the laughter burst out afresh.
sentences.cn: 这时候,那阵狂笑又重新爆发出来.

trans.tran_en: if you do something afresh, you do it again from the beginning
